title: "Robot dog could be the newest recruit for local law enforcement"
excerpt: "The newest member of your local police force-- might just be a robot. \"At some point in the future officers have an autonomous robotic partner, maybe it’s in the form of a quadrapet, maybe its in another form, but that’s how I see police evolving,\" said Steve Reinharz, CEO Robotic Assistance Devices and AITX."
